Uses of Interface
org.sadun.text.ffp.FlatFileParser.Listener

Packages that use FlatFileParser.Listener
org.sadun.text.ffp The main FFP package.  
org.sadun.text.ffp.test A package containing a regression test suite. 
 

Uses of FlatFileParser.Listener in org.sadun.text.ffp
 

Subinterfaces of FlatFileParser.Listener in org.sadun.text.ffp
static interface FlatFileParser.AdvancedListener
          Classes implementing this extension of Listener will receive more events on flat file parsing.
static interface FlatFileParser.UnmatchedLineListener
          Classes implementing this extension of Listener will receive notification about lines where no condition matches on parsing, if the failOnNoMatchingConditions property is false.
 

Classes in org.sadun.text.ffp that implement FlatFileParser.Listener
 class BaseListener
          A base implementation of FlatFileParser.Listener which activates only when on a specific line format name (or a specific regular expression match) is successfully parsed.
 class EchoListener
          A FlatFileParser.Listener which echoes the parsed data when a LineFormat whose is found whose name matches a regular expression (provided at construction).
 

Methods in org.sadun.text.ffp with parameters of type FlatFileParser.Listener
 void FlatFileParser.addListener(FlatFileParser.Listener l)
          Addf the given listener to the registered listeners set.
 void FlatFileParser.removeListener(FlatFileParser.Listener l)
          Remove the given listener from the registered listeners set.
